snippet: The number of kidnapped schoolgirls missing in Nigeria has been revised to 276, up by more than 30 from a previous estimate, the police said late Thursday, adding that the actual number abducted by Islamic extremists on April 14 was more than 300.
lead_paragraph: The number of kidnapped schoolgirls missing in Nigeria has been revised to 276, up by more than 30 from a previous estimate, the police said late Thursday, adding that the actual number abducted by Islamic extremists on April 14 was more than 300.

headline.main: Nigeria: Police Revise Number of Kidnapped Students
headline.print_headline: Nigeria: Police Revise Number of Kidnapped Students
